Title: Relates to the length of the pre-licensing course required of applicants for a driver's license
Summary: Provides that the course consisting of classroom driver training and highway safety instruction that is required of driver's license applicants shall be not more than six hours instead of five.
LawCode: Amd ยง502, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the length of the pre-licensing course required of applicants for a driver's license
